archeology.tip.bundle: You can scroll the mouse wheel over a Bundle to select which item you want to extract.
archeology.tip.cooldown: Unlike my other modpacks, you unfortunately have to suffer with the combat cooldown until I can find a mod to balance axe damage.
archeology.tip.currency: You can type $currency (or Â£) into REI to view all the currencies the modpack uses.
archeology.tip.fossils: Fossils are found in a variety of biomes & structures. Explore for a bit if you want to find a specific one.
archeology.tip.mouse_tweaks: Remember that Mouse Tweaks is installed, so you can shift+click and drag the mouse to mass-move items (and more).
archeology.tip.wits: If you find a structure, you can type /wits in chat to see which structure it is - just be sure you're standing inside it first.
